about_the_game:
They say ""Misery is Magic"", and that couldn't be truer than it is for this pair of magic beasts. The Grimcorn curses enemies for extra damage with its Impure Strike, and the Necrocorn can bestow a Dark Blessing to cleanse allies. Oh, and that Tinycorn, you ask? Sure, it grants bonuses, but its brand of magic is extreme cuteness. Get enough copies of these Ultra-rare Troops to ascend them to Legendary level if you wish to, plus the Tinycorn Pet and a heap of Souls, Pet Food and Keys.

This Bundle is great for new-to-intermediate players who want to add solid attack and support options on their teams.

CONTENTS:
  • 16 Ultra-rare Troop - Grimcorn
  • 16 Ultra-rare Troop - Necrocorn
  • 16 Pet - Tinycorn
  • 10,000 Souls
  • 15 Purple Pet Food
  • 5 Event Keys

BECOME A VIP AND GET PERKS
This purchase will earn you permanent VIP Points which will help you unlock VIP Levels. Higher VIP Levels come with increasingly large bonuses to Gem purchases, rewards, daily login bonuses, and some unique extras.
